pageContent: Purpose: To determine which health care provider and what timing is considered most suitable to discuss sexual and relational changes after prostate cancer treatment according to the point of view of men and their partners.

metaData.source:
Recovery of sexual function after nerve-sparing radical retropubic prostatectomy: is cavernous nitric oxide level a prognostic index?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16151472/
